title: The War On Islam: 9/11 Revisited, Uncovered & Exposed
description: The War On Islam - 9-11 Revisited, Uncovered & Exposed - Dr. Kevin Barrett, Richard Gage and Christopher Bollyn (2017) 720p.mp4 - 1h 51min 33s 1280 x 720 https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/15/c1fd5af1f6be01518e1d130e8742cdef.jpg Saturday 18 February 2017 Nation Of Islam Detroit, Michigan This presentation is from the Nation of Islam’s annual Saviors Day event at Cobo Convention Center. 5,000 people attended this Plenary Session. Dr. Kevin Barrett is a Muslim and PhD Islamic Studies scholar. He is one of America’s best-known critics of the “War on Terror.” He has authored and edited several books and appeared many times on Fox, CNN, PBS and other broadcast outlets and been widely covered by print media. He currently works as a talk radio host, nonprofit organizer, editor at Veterans Today, and pundit at Press TV, Russia Today, al-Etejah and other international channels. Investigative journalist Christopher Bollyn began covering the attacks on the day it occurred. In his words: “This deception only has power as long as a majority of the population is deceived. My purpose is to expose the deception and undeceive as many people as possible.” Christopher connects the many Zionist (supporter of Israel) dots that orchestrate the 9/11 atrocities and the cover-up both here in American and deep in the black heart of terrorist Israel starting in the 1970’s. Produced: 2017 Category: Education Please share this information far and wide, burn the video to DVDs/Blu-ray discs or put it on USB Flash Drives and give them out to friends, family and others. Please seed as long as possible, at least to a ratio of 1.100, thank you :) General : The War On Islam - 9-11 Revisited, Uncovered & Exposed - Dr. Kevin Barrett, Richard Gage and Christopher Bollyn (2017) 720p.mp4 Format : MPEG-4 at 1 025 kb/s Length : 818 MiB for 1 h 51 min 33 s 430 ms Video #0 : AVC at 830 kb/s Aspect : 1280 x 720 (1.778) at 29.970 fps Audio #0 : AAC at 192 kb/s Infos : 2 channels, 44.1 kHz Screens: https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/15/adbb16ee96a7484ca02b705381fd4581.png https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/15/9fd93e22ecb22b4ab508f204a4a238c0.png https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/15/6f53ddae2112f8527b0d12131a905f80.png https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/15/4d942b552a4f12bdfdfe059a40c62f05.png https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/15/b2f88751775c389e4e05f85de369d465.png https://extraimage.net/images/2018/09/15/d4a8a0305a7c9a95f63cc6db8e7ddc71.png
